snippet.title: Hero Express - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Nintendo Switch
https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Hero-Express-1591041.html
Microsoft Xbox One
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/hero-express/9pm5mxt618ph?rtc=1&activetab=pivot%3Aoverviewtab
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1080630/Hero_Express/
Itch
https://fantasticostudio.itch.io/hero-express
Gamejolt
https://gamejolt.com/games/heroexpress/412652

Get ready to jump in, in this crazy adventure that will bring you throughout the whole world. Hero Express brings some fast, crazy driving action to this funny world. 

But mind, this is not a classic racing game, but rather a skill based game where the player will have to try and complete stages without getting a game over first.
